summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2358 for the improvement of Latona Avenue, from East Seventy-seventh Street to East Eighty-fifth Street, all in The City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and constructing plank crosswalks, together with the necessary surface and sub-drains for the property drainage of said district; under Ordinance No. 24540, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
